lines: THOUGH YOUR SINS BE AS SCARLET
Zibi zyako nozivula, Ziya ku tubizigwa,
Zibi zyako nozivula, Zya ku tubizigwa.
Mbuli bulowa zisalale, Zila tuba bu,
Zibi zyako nozivula, Zibi zyako nozivula,
Ziya ku tubizigwa, Ziya ku tubizigwa.
Komvwa Mwami ulaita, Kopiluka kwa Leza,
Komvwa Mwami ula ita, Kopiluka kwa Leza,
Komvwa Mwami ulaita, Komvwa Mwami ula ita,
Kopiluka kwa Leza, Kopilika kwa Leza.
Ula lekelela zibi, Aku ziluba lyonse,
Ula lekelela zibi, aku ziluba lyonse,
Ula baita bantu bonse, UlaÕmba Leza,
Ula lekelela zibi, Ula lekelela zibi,
Aku ziluba lyonse, aku ziluba lyonse.
